title: Too Much of a Good Thing
brief_description: A fascinating documentary that examines the connections between diet and health. Leading Australian nutritional scientists discuss the major “diseases of affluence” - cancers, cardiovascular disease and diabetes - that result from our everyday high fat, high salt, high sugar and low carbohydrate diet.
